formula: a(n)=sum(k=1..n, (1+(-1)^(n-k))*2^(-k)*sum(i=0..k/2, (-1)^((n+k)/2-i)*binomial(k,i)*(2*i-k)^n)/(k-1)!), [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Apr 19 2011]a(n) = D^n(x*exp(x)) evaluated at x = 0, where D is the operator sqrt(1-x^2)*d/dx. Cf. A009623. - Peter Bala, Dec 06 2011
author: _R. H. Hardin_
